attributes.action: Higher wages for all essential workers Revoking of Piri Patel's immigration plan
attributes.additional_details: Key workers are being neglected on the front line. They are being martyred for our survival and the government doesn't care. This petition is our chance to help the people we rely on but so often neglect.
attributes.background:
Increase minimum wage.
Increase payments for key workers.
Revoke Patel's plan to deny key workers access to the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government isn't responsible for the pay of workers outside of the public sector, other than for the minimum wage. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306660
